articles.description: Dikembe Dixson scored 18 points, Jordan Blount had 14 points and 15 rebounds and Illinois-Chicago beat Green Bay 83-75 on Friday night.
articles.headline: Dixson scores 18, leads UIC over Green Bay 83-75

articles.description: Tookie Brown scored 23 points and Georgia Southern knocked off rival Georgia State 85-80 on Friday night.
articles.headline: Brown scores 23, leads Georgia Southern over Georgia State

articles.description: Loudon Love scored 15 points and Wright State held off a late rally from Northern Kentucky 69-67 in a matchup of the Horizon League's top two teams on Friday night.
articles.headline: Wright State beats Northern Kentucky in Horizon showdown

articles.description: Devon Goodman, who had scored 35 points all season, came off the bench to hit five 3-pointers and piled up 23 points to lead Pennsylvania to a 74-62 victory on Friday night that kept the Quakers tied with Harvard atop the Ivy League.
articles.headline: Goodman's big night helps give Penn 74-62 win over Columbia

images.caption: Devon Goodman's 25 points, including 18 in the first half, helped Penn defeat Columbia
images.name: Penn rallies from early deficit to upend Columbia  - Via Ivy League
